# Bigger Greeting


## {Introduction @showdialog}

You've created a greeting, now let's send it over the top!

![Send our love](/static/skillmap/story/story-activity-2.gif "Why do tropical fish like saltwater?" )

## {Step 2}

The code for a simple greeting card is already in the workspace.  
**Build a new card by editing the images**  
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

---

- :paint brush:  Choose a new background from the gallery by clicking on the grey box in  
``||scene:set background image to [ ]||``  
and toggling to the **"Gallery"** tab at
the top of the window.  

_üí° Or stay in the **Editor** and create your own)._

- :mouse pointer:  When you're done, click **Next** to move on to the next step.

```blocks
ee88888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888888
`)
effects.confetti.startScreenEffect()
music.playMelody("G B A G C5 B A B", 120)

```

---

![The background gallery](/static/skillmap/story/story-bg-select.gif "Toggle between editor and gallery" )


## {Step 3}
 
**Cue the music**  
üéπüéπüéπ

---

- :mouse pointer:  If you feel like it, choose a new melody by clicking the note in
the ``||music:play melody [ ] at tempo [120] (bpm)||`` block.


```blocks

`)
effects.confetti.startScreenEffect()
//@highlight
music.playMelody("G B A G C5 B A B ", 120)

```

---

![The music gallery](/static/skillmap/assets/music-gallery-toggle.gif "Toggle between editor and gallery" )






## {Step 4}

You can make your card even more special by adding some text that
cycles through when the **‚í∂** button is pressed.

---

- :game:  From the ``||controller: Controller||`` category, drag an  
``||controller:on [A] button [pressed]||``  
container into the workspace.

- :circle:  From the ``||game:Game||`` category, grab the  
``||game: show long text [" "] [bottom]||``  
block and snap it into the empty **on A button pressed** container.

- :mouse pointer:  Add a personal message into the new **show long text** block.

``` blocks

controller.A.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, function () {
    game.showLongText("Happy Earth Day", DialogLayout.Bottom)
})


```

## {Step 5}

Now take a look at your card on the game screen

**Don't forget to press the ‚í∂ button to show your message.**



## {Step 6}

**What a nice surprise**   

Add a second message below the first to really show you care.

---

- :mouse pointer:  Right click  
``||game: show long text [" "] [bottom]||``  
and choose **Duplicate**.

- :mouse pointer:  Grab the copied block and snap it into the bottom of the  
``||on [A] button [pressed]||``  
container.

- :mouse pointer:  Add another personal message into the new  
``||game: show long text [" "] [bottom]||``  
block.

``` blocks

controller.A.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, function () {
    game.showLongText("Happy Earth Day", DialogLayout.Bottom)
    game.showLongText("To the greatest Earth I know", DialogLayout.Bottom)
})

```


## {Step 7}

**üé® Make it POP üé®**  
Customize the dialog to bring it all together.

---

- :mouse pointer:  From ``||game:Game||``, grab a  
``||game:set dialog frame to [ ]||``  
block and
snap it into **the top** of the  
``||on [A] button [pressed]||``  
container in your workspace.

- :mouse pointer:  Choose a dialog design by clicking on the grey box in the  
``||game:set dialog frame to [ ]||``  
box and toggling to the **Gallery**.


``` blocks
controller.A.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, function () {
    game.setDialogFrame(img`
        88888..8888888888888888....88888.
        87768888777877787778777888867778.
        87777686767876767678767688777778.
        87767767667676676676766786776768.
        8677676767767767677677678676778..
        .877768777686767776867678667768..
        .886668888888888888888888886688..
        .888888866666666666666668877768..
        88677786666666666666666668766778.
        87766686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668866888.
        88866886666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668666778.
        87766786666666666666666668777688.
        88677786666666666666666668766778.
        87766686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668866888.
        88866886666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668666778.
        87766786666666666666666668777688.
        .867778866666666666666668888888..
        .886688888888888888888888866688..
        .867766876768677767686777867778..
        .8776768767767767677677676767768.
        86767768766767667667676676776778.
        87777788676787676767876768677778.
        87776888877787778777877788886778.
        88888..88888888888888888....8888.
        .................................
        `)
    game.showLongText("Happy Earth Day", DialogLayout.Bottom)
    game.showLongText("To the greatest Earth I know", DialogLayout.Bottom)
})

```


## {Step 8}

Take a look at your card on the game screen.

üòç üòç üòç 

**Press the ‚í∂ button to cycle through your messages.**


## {Step 9}

**The final touch üéÄ**  

Change the color of your text so it works with your new background.

---

- :circle:  From ``||game:Game||``, grab a  
``||game:set dialog text color to [ ]||``  
block and
snap it into the top of the  
``||on [A] button [pressed]||``  
block in your workspace.

- :mouse pointer:  Click the grey box and choose a color for your message that looks good and is
easy to read.  It's okay if you need to change it a few times before your text
is just right.

``` blocks


controller.A.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, function () {
    game.setDialogTextColor(1)
    game.setDialogFrame(img`
        88888..8888888888888888....88888.
        87768888777877787778777888867778.
        87777686767876767678767688777778.
        87767767667676676676766786776768.
        8677676767767767677677678676778..
        .877768777686767776867678667768..
        .886668888888888888888888886688..
        .888888866666666666666668877768..
        88677786666666666666666668766778.
        87766686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668866888.
        88866886666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668666778.
        87766786666666666666666668777688.
        88677786666666666666666668766778.
        87766686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668866888.
        88866886666666666666666668677778.
        87777686666666666666666668776678.
        87667786666666666666666668666778.
        87766786666666666666666668777688.
        .867778866666666666666668888888..
        .886688888888888888888888866688..
        .867766876768677767686777867778..
        .8776768767767767677677676767768.
        86767768766767667667676676776778.
        87777788676787676767876768677778.
        87776888877787778777877788886778.
        88888..88888888888888888....8888.
        .................................
        `)
    game.showLongText("Happy Earth Day", DialogLayout.Bottom)
    game.showLongText("To the greatest Earth I know", DialogLayout.Bottom)
})
```


## {Congrats @showdialog}

ü•≥ That's it! ü•≥

**Before you click "Done", take a look at the card on your game screen
to see how it works!**



## {Finale}

**üéä Congrats üéä**

Now you have a card that any friend would be excited to get!

Click **Done** to return to the main page where you can share your game
with family and friends!
